::: {.callout-tip}
To run the language model faster and especially on the edge devices, we need to optimize the model. This optimization can be done in different ways. In this article, we will discuss some of the optimization techniques. In this blog, I will introduce different methods and the existing solutions to enable the language model to run faster.
